title: 820-01598 no restore T2
message: The client tried to format and install Catalina and ended up locking the mac, I tried to restore the T2, but it shows the following error "AMRestoreErrorDomain error 9 - Failed to receive a message from the device, might be a connection problem with USB host. (Communication error, possibly USB disconnection).

title: 820-01598 no restore T2
message:
Did you exactly follow all the steps from the tutorial?
Try another connection cable.
Be sure all AWAKE and SLPS2R voltages remain steady.

maintenance expired.

Strange that doesn't allow DFU anymore, but you can expect weird things from Apple...

Maybe the board restarts;  check at least if PPBUS_G3H is steady.
